name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Staff AI Agent Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing cutting-edge applications in healthcare and finance. Expertise in **Python**, with hands-on experience in **FastAPI** and implementing **Large Language Models (LLMs)** using frameworks like **LangChain** and **LlamaIndex**. Proven track record in deploying solutions on **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure**, ensuring high availability and scalable architectures. Proficient in building and managing **CI/CD** pipelines, utilizing **Redis** for efficient data handling. Adept at integrating advanced technologies such as **OpenAI** and **Anthropic** for enhanced AI capabilities and developing **RAG pipelines** for effective real-time data processing.

Strong background in compliance-driven development following HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Proven leadership in MLOps, including model training and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Committed to fostering a culture of collaboration and innovation, with excellent problem-solving skills and a passion for mentorship and technical leadership.
